mapper.select: SELECT A.NUM AS reportNum , A.DATE AS reportDate , A.CONTENT AS reportContent , A.STATE AS reportState , A.REPORT_CATEGORY_NUM AS reportCategoryNum , A.FASHION_POST_NUM AS fashionPostNum , A.REVIEW_POST_NUM AS reviewPostNUm , A.MENTORING_POST_NUM AS mentoringPostNum , A.COMMENT_NUM AS commentNum FROM REPORT A
